page_content: The page provides a guide on how to embed MapBS, a mapping software, into websites.
The page serves as an FAQ for eKonto, a software used for e-governance in Basel-Stadt.
The page provides tax forms for legal entities in Basel-Stadt and includes downloadable forms in various formats.
The page provides FAQs about a data theft incident at the Erziehungsdepartement des Kantons Basel-Stadt.
The page provides a guide on how to integrate WMS services into various software platforms like QGIS, ArcGIS, and AutoCAD.
The page provides information on the E-Voting system in Basel-Stadt, including its use for people with disabilities and Swiss citizens abroad.
The page serves as a portal for exam experts to manage their personal information, compensations, and expenses.
